title: Highest Fossil Fuel Energy Consumption
description: In 2022, Turkmenistan had the highest fossil fuel energy consumption in the world, with fossil fuels accounting for 100% of its total energy consumption.

title: Highest Ratio of Female to Male Labor Force Participation
description: In 2024, Turkmenistan had the highest ratio of female to male labor force participation, with a rate of 104.66%.

title: Lowest Renewable Electricity Output
description: In 2021, Turkmenistan had the lowest renewable electricity output, with only 0.01% of its total electricity output coming from renewable sources.

title: Lowest Control of Corruption
description: In 2022, Turkmenistan ranked very low in control of corruption, with a percentile rank of 0.47% in the lower bound of the 90% confidence interval.

title: Lowest Voice and Accountability
description: In 2023, Turkmenistan had one of the lowest scores for voice and accountability, with a percentile rank of 0.49%.
